title: ‘Succession’ Season 3 Preview: Where Were We?
description:
Sean Fennessey and Joanna Robinson join in anticipation of the new season of the hit HBO show ‘Succession’ to talk about everything they love about the previous seasons and recap the final episode of Season 2, “This Is Not for Tears.”
Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Joanna Robinson
Producer: Steve Ahlman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
